## ZipFS class

ZIP file system implementation using zip.js.

Supports reading, writing, and manipulating ZIP archives as a virtual file system. Can be mounted onto other file systems and used in combination with other VFS implementations.

**Signature:**

```typescript
declare class ZipFS extends VFS 
```
**Extends:** [VFS](doc/markdown/./base.vfs.md)

## Remarks

- The class requires zip.js dependencies to be provided. - Virtual files (staged but not saved/written to ZIP yet) are supported for fast file operations and batch updates. - All paths are normalized to ensure consistency.

## Example


```typescript
import { ZipFS } from './zipfs';
import { zipjs } from 'zip.js'; // or custom zipjs build

const zipFS = new ZipFS('test.zip', zipjs, false);
await zipFS.initializeFromData(arrayBufferOrBlob);
const fileList = await zipFS.readDirectory('/');
await zipFS.writeFile('/new.txt', 'Hello!');
const outBlob = await zipFS.getZipBlob();
```
